modName: Chevaleresse II Armor for UNP by Yurica
summary: adds a set of armor and a greatsword called Divine Steel to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1297.photobucket.com/albums/ag24/yurica/inside%20banner%20jpg_zps6r0t7niz.jpg[/img]

[center]:: + :: INTRODUCTION :: + ::

This mod adds a set of Divine Steel heavy armor and greatsword to the game.

The armor and weapon are equal to Daedric level and can be upgraded as usual. The helmet uses an invisible mesh for heavy armor set bonus only.

:: + :: REQUIREMENTS :: + ::

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT-Highheels System[/url] (must-have or I think your games will crash...)

The armor is also compatible with other body types; but UNP-Body compatible texture is suggested.

:: + :: INSTALLATIONS :: + ::

- Extract the downloaded file to a location.

- Copy and paste the "data" folder into your steamapps/common/skyrim folder.

- Activate the .esp file with your preferred method.

:: + :: ACQUIRING THE ITEMS :: + ::

The armor and weapon set can be crafted under the Daedric category.

They can also be fully improved in the workbench and spinning wheel respectively.

:: + :: CONTACTS :: + ::

I can be reached via:

[url=http://yurica-skyrim.tumblr.com/]Tumblr

[/url][url=https://twitter.com/yurica_skyrim]Twitter

[/url]or feel free to PM me if you have any ideas =)
